page.title: 16Then & Now- life in l925 (4)
page.content: {Did you have a bath? } Yes we had a tin bath and we'd fill it with water and put it in front of the fire and have our bath in front of the fire. That's all the bath we had- there was no running water or anything.{ {Did you have a job?} After I left school I went out to where Dr Halliday is, to the Rev and Mrs Glanville and I went out as his parlourmaid and we used to have to get to work at 7.30 and be out there all day but come evening we were allowed out for half an hour break and then back again for the evening meal and washing up and we always had to go in on a Sunday. {Were there lots of shops in the {village?} There were 25.{ {How did your mother cook your food?
